overview: Twitter Grader dubbed him one of North Carolina’s Twitter Elite. According to him, he’s just a regular guy from the south doing what he loves. As a Partner at Outspective Justin Brackett (AKA @JustinTheSouth) manages all strategic and creative aspects of digital campaign development. He helps businesses create product preference, loyal communities and most importantly, trust, through emerging media. Helping businesses build solid digital marketing strategies and better brands that generate valuable leads and sales, utilizing innovative online marketing and social media initiatives.A thought leader in the digital marketing space, Brackett regularly presents at numerous industry conferences and tradeshows on topics such as digital marketing, social media marketing, and the business impact of social and business organization.
